JobTitle: Wireless Carrier Certification Technical Program Manager
JobFullDesc: The Wireless HW Module & Subsystem Technical Program Management (TPM) team at Facebook Reality Labs is responsible for developing and building devices and experiences that bring Facebook’s products and technologies to new areas. We are looking for a Wireless Carrier Certification TPM to play a key role in integrating future hardware products with mobile network operators around the world. You will lead multidisciplinary programs through the product development process and play a key role in interfacing with our cross-functional partners, carrier engineering teams, contractors, and mobile network operators. You will drive and manage the carrier device development plan, guiding execution through the planning of device requirements, manage certification schedules internally, collaborating with the wireless and carrier engineering stakeholder on feature scope and compliance, and identifying and mitigating risks.Closely collaborate with carrier engineering (TAM), certification, and product management teams to drive, track, and deliver Cellular and other wireless technology features for the certification of AR/VR/Portal/Wearables products across multiple mobile network operators worldwide.Manage and arrange deliverables internally for the carrier engineering teams and regulatory bodies like FCC, GCF, PTCRB etc.Create and maintain development, delivery, and compliance schedules based on device requirements, technical challenges, lead-times and business needs provided by carrier engineering and certification teams.Deliver HW, SW/FW and support logistics for required testing, user trials and telecom carriers for certification.Issue triage - identify nature of issue, allocate to the appropriate HW or SW/FW teams, provide issue disposition, enable rapid turn time for issue management and same-day fix.Create, collaborate with HW and SW stakeholders, communicate program status, and deliver on internal and external validation schedules.Demonstrate “bias for action”: pro-actively seek out and correct inefficiencies, contribute to resource planning.Anticipate: see around corners, identify/address potential setbacks.Drive device pre-scan and readiness for various carrier/regulatory certification phases and work with compliance team for final certification.Up to 20% travel.MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONSBS in engineering, telecommunications, or equivalent technical experience.Familiarity with carrier certification process and preparation for feature delivery from the development.Familiarity with carrier features, carrier specifications and industry cellular standards like 3GPP, GCF, PTCRB, FCC, OTA standards etc.Familiarity with carrier features, wireless systems, HW/SW development process and technologies in consumer products.Knowledge of phase gate approach to technology development projects.Experience operating autonomously in ambiguous and complex environments.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSBS in engineering, telecommunications, or equivalent technical experience.Familiarity with carrier certification process and preparation for feature delivery from the development.Familiarity with carrier features, carrier specifications and industry cellular standards like 3GPP, GCF, PTCRB, FCC, OTA standards etc.Familiarity with carrier features, wireless systems, HW/SW development process and technologies in consumer products.Knowledge of phase gate approach to technology development projects.Experience operating autonomously in ambiguous and complex environments.Facebook's mission is to give people the power to build community and bring the world closer together.
